name: //TWENTY
description:
twenty is a horror in text, following young woman who wakes up in a terrifying dungeon after being left for dead. With only patchy memories of what happened the night before, she must navigate the maze while coming to terms with events. There are two endings to see.

Its challenging subject matter and violent imagery make it 18+/adults only.
The core theme of this game is rape survival. This is not a fetish game.
Please approach with caution and maturity.
